abstract: Russian lawmakers pass series of measures purported to prevent terrorism but that human rights activists warn are attack on freedoms of speech, privacy and conscience.

headline.print_headline: Russia Moves to Tighten Counterterror Law
headline.main: Russia Moves to Tighten Counterterror Law; Rights Activists See Threat to Freedoms

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject

snippet: Measures approved by the lower house of Parliament include a prison term for failing to report a planned terrorist act, as well as restrictions on religious activities.
lead_paragraph: Measures approved by the lower house of Parliament include a prison term for failing to report a planned terrorist act, as well as restrictions on religious activities.
